Version Info Powered by CartoDroid CartoDroid is a GIS (Geographic Information System) designed and developed by Instituto Tecnológico Agrario de Castilla y León (ITACyL), attached to Consejería de Agricultura y Ganadería, Junta de Castilla y León (JCyL). \u00A9 2016 - Instituto Tecnológico Agrario de Castilla y León
All rights reserved Instituto Tecnológico Agrario de Castilla y León (ITACyL) soporte.cartodroid@itacyl.es There is no mailing app installed This application uses Google Maps Google Maps Terms of Service Search for updates Loading Lat Lon project Tap again to exit The reference system configured as projected is geographic. Problem loading entity Problem saving entity Entities deleted Problem deleting entity Multipart entities exploded Problem exploding multipart entities Problem merging entities No data to share Problem sharing layer Entities copied Problem copying entities Some entities have not been copied Entities cut Problem cutting entities Could not delete some entities Show all entities Show pending entities Share layer SIGPAC search Following Add bookmark View bookmarks View batches Synchro Previous zoom Next zoom Show destination Remove destination List view Table view Could not get current location Import entities Import \"recintos\" from a SIGPAC references file (CSV format) No SIGPAC databases found Import graphic entities from CSV files (Attributes + WKT Geometry) 1 : Settings About Statistics Measure Enable follow up Disable follow up Follow up enabled Follow up disabled Showing inspection pending entities Showing all entities There is no layer with the b_insp field Lo table selected Save bookmark Bookmarks It seems that Google Play Services is not installed. Share Send data Accept Cancel Yes No Close View selected History Creation selected Add entity Layer up Layer down Guided navigation This will exit CartoDroid to begin guided navigation General Screen orientation Map Map type Basic map Map type General Orientation Developer options Shows options and stats useful for debugging Show zoom level Show current zoom level Show scale Shows the scale on the map Show center Shows a mark on the center of the map Show coordinates Shows the coordinates of the center of the map Show editing vertices Shows the vertices of the sketch Show editing labels Shows labels on geometry editingde geometrías Units Measurement units for areas Default reference system (SRID) This reference system (SRID) will be used by default Projected reference system (SRID) This reference system (SRID) will be used to calculate lengths and areas (25830 for instance) Maximum number of geometries Maximum number of geometries that will be obtained from database (the less, the faster) Maximum number of labels Maximum number of labels that will be shown on screen (the less, the faster) Minimum accuracy Minimum accuracy for a location to be considered (meters) Minimum distance between points Minimum distance to consider two consecutive points to be different (meters) Follow up turns When follow up is enabled, the map will rotate Layers Configuration saved Error saving configuration Operations Layer enabled Open close Keep entity data Basic map Satellite images, no labels Physical map based on terrain info Normal and satellite views mixture Edit Label labels Merge Split View as list Symbology Operation Info This operation can only be applied to one (1) entity Entities entities Copy Die cut Import SIGPAC entities Selected file entities will be imported into the layer Import stats Stats saved on: Imported Not found Errors Selected file entities will be imported into the layer Imported Errors Open stats file The file type must be Error loading file Error loading file The file type must be or File not found Empty file Area Perimeter Length Definition Query Previous Definition Queries Delete history Filter history will be cleared Most used filters Error loading definition queries for the layer of Add Remove Straight line navigation Navigate using a straight line Guided navigations Guided navigation used external navigation applications Info Entity info Edit entity data Edit entity alphanumeric data Circular cut Split the entity using a circular sketch Set center Set circle center Circle using two fingers Draw a circle using two fingers Set center on current location Set the current locations as the center of the circle Set radius on current location Set the current locations as the radius of the circle Set radius Set circle radius Split Split the entity Merge Merge entities Explode multipart Explode multipart entities into single part Copy Copy entities to another layer Die cut Die cut entities using another layer as reference Delete Delete the entity Selection list View a list of the selected entities Create Create a new entity Cancel Create line Create point to point line Create circunference Create a line using a circunference as the sketch Create polygon Create point to point polygon Create circle Create a polygon using a circle as the sketch Create point Create a new point entity Edit geometry Edit geometry vertices Move point Move a point entity Zoom to selection Zoom to seleected elements Entity that will maintain data: The entity has no editable alphanumeric attributes Entities from the layer cannot be pasted into another layer There is a problem with the field Problem during validation. Please check the fields Destination layer: There is no layer that can receive entities from Reference layer: There is no layer that can die cut entities from No selectable entities on Error selecting entities from Select entities from layer Delete selected entities? Delete also associated pictures Multipart will be exploded. Resulting entities will keep it\'s alphanumeric data Layer will be exported and a confirmation message will be shown Table will be exported and a confirmation message will be shown Error configuring layers or symbologies. Please check configuration files Delete all entities from Year Provincia Municipio Agregado Zona Polígono Parcela Recinto Format: No \"polígonos\" found No \"parcelas\" found No \"recintos\" found No \"recinto\" found File to load No file manager found on the device Name Description Ref. system (SRID) Type Special fields Table fields Add field Minimum scale Maximum scale Min. scale (labels) Max. scale (labels) Picture gallery Pictures can be added to entities \"Recinto\" reference SIGPAC \"recinto\" reference Inspected Tells whether an entity has been inspected Inspection date Stores the inspection date (user modifiable) Observatioes Free text field to add user observations Creation/modification date Stores the creation and modification dates (used internally, won\'t be shown on forms) New project Project name The project already exists Valid characters for the name are a-z A-Z and 0-9 Save Load project Open project Add layer from ITACyL\'s geographic repository Selected layer is not on the device. Tap here to download it now.\n\nrestart CartoDroid or reoen the project when downloaded to see changes. New vectorial layer New layer from .sqlite No compatible tables found Edit vectorial layer The field will be deleted The new layer needs a symbology The identifier should be 3 characters long The name should be 3 characters long The name is reserved A field with that name already exists Selected reference system (SRID) is not valid Valid characters for the identifier are a-z A-Z and 0-9 Valid characters for the name are a-z A-Z and 0-9 A file already exists with the name A layer already exists with the identifier Error creating vectorial layer Error creating layer Error deleting layer Error deleting picture The polygon is invalid and can\'t be created There are no installed applications that can open the download URL Delete layer Selected layer will be deleted from table of contents (TOC). Data files will not be deleted Delete table Selected table will be deleted from table of contents (TOC). Log Level Developer mode Developer mode Show project file User Password PIN New Sqlite Existing Sqlite Vectorial layer Raster layer WMS Import from another project Some modifications have been made to the table\nto be compatible with CartoDruid The layer can\'t be loaded.\nThe geometry column name has to be \"GEOMETRY\" select a table Sign Signature Sign here Clear Do you want to overwrite the signature? it must be filled It is not possible import multipoint type layers In order to start the application, you must accept all permissions. Permissions Overlap rule Overlapping of polygons is not allowed Overlap Get account permission allows us to get your email Some features will not work until you accept this permission In order to use this functionality, you must accept the account access permission. The size of the geometry must be between and infinite It was not possible to import the project.\nTry to open the file with a file explorer or import it directly in CartoDruid Projected Srid not allowed.
